float Vec3CrossProductMag ( Vec3 *  Operand1,
Vec3 *  Operand2 
)

Calculates the magnitude of the cross product.

Parameters:
Operand1Vector to calculate the cross product magnitude with
Operand2Vector to calculate the cross product magnitude with

Definition at line 276 of file Vector3.c.

{
        float i, j, k;
        
        i = (Operand1->y * Operand2->z - Operand1->z * Operand2->y);
        j = -(Operand1->x * Operand2->z - Operand1->z * Operand2->x);
        k = (Operand1->x * Operand2->y - Operand1->y * Operand2->x);

        return sqrt(i * i + j * j + k * k);
}
